original_title: Marilyn Manson On Tour: Symphonies of Destruction
overview: On April 20th, 1999, the Columbine High School massacre happened. At the same time Marilyn Manson performed a show in Chicago, Illinois.  This is that show.
tagline: What he did the day his reputation was ruined
title: Marilyn Manson On Tour: Symphonies of Destruction
